location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant Cookney, Commander of the Barbara Patamai

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging a communication sent by the Lieutenant dated 14 February 1811 and in response states that the extra sepoys requested have been ordered to board his vessel for its next voyage. It further notes that William Bruce believes that the boats the Lieutenant reported sighting near the Island of Carrack [Khārk, Jazīreh-ye] are likely to have been merchant vessels, and that he may proceed with his voyage.
